Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-52533 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-52533 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.78.1-5, affected by CVE-2024-52533
